headline: Does Allstate’s Strong Growth and Recent Dip Signal a New Opportunity for 2025?
summary: If you have been eyeing Allstate and wondering whether now is the right time to buy, sell, or just sit tight, you are not alone. The stock has kept investors on their toes lately, with short-term dips this past month offset by seriously impressive long-term growth. At its most recent close, Allstate was priced at $196.3, down 1.9% in the last week and 5.1% over the past month. While those numbers might give some investors pause, it is worth zooming out. Year to date, the stock is up 2.3%. If...

headline: U.S. Private Auto Premiums Hit Record-High Q2 Mark
summary: Private auto insurers in the US continued to benefit from earned-in rate increases in the second quarter and again pushed premiums to record levels. Read more here.
